definition: litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
seeds of litchi or lychee (in TCM)

sentences.english: Strawberry, blackcurrant, litchi and mango are some popular flavoured yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 草莓，黑醋栗，荔枝和芒果是一些受欢迎风味的酸奶。

sentences.english: Among hardiest of cherimoya, does well in most present growing areas.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒其中荔枝，做得好，目前大部分主产区。

sentences.english: Top notes include bamboo leaf, litchi, Bulgarian rose and violet.
sentences.chinese: 前调有竹叶，荔枝，保加利亚玫瑰和紫罗兰。

sentences.english: The research aimed to analyze the components and antibacterial activities of essential oils from Salvia plebeia R.
sentences.chinese: 分析荔枝草挥发油化学成分并对其抑菌活性进行研究。

sentences.english: Chicken and lychee, together is the "auspicious" means.
sentences.chinese: 鸡与荔枝，合起来就是“吉利”的意思。

sentences.english: The content of ent-kaurane diterpenes was highest in A. squamosa L. (hainan).
sentences.chinese: 贝壳杉烷型二萜成分以海南产圆滑番荔枝中含量最高。

sentences.english: The value model has been applied in lychee fresh-keeping industrialized business optical designed.
sentences.chinese: 价值模型已应用于荔枝保鲜产业化经营的优化设计。

sentences.english: Lychee is a tropical fruit from southeast China .
sentences.chinese: 荔枝是一种源自中国东南部的一种热带水果。

sentences.english: There is so much litchi in Shenzhen. I can eat as many as I like.
sentences.chinese: 深圳的荔枝真多，我可以大饱口福了。
除了荔枝我知道的多着呢。

sentences.english: Next was a tour and tasting session at a winery making sickeningly sweet lychee wine.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的环节是到一家荔枝酒厂参观和品尝。

sentences.english: Lychee is first of all the fruits, even for a generation of writers of ecstasy.
sentences.chinese: 荔枝乃众水果之首，连一代文豪也为之入迷。

sentences.english: Litchi is a kind of tropical fruit native to southern China. It is world famously known as "king of fruit".
sentences.chinese: 荔枝是原产于中国的一种热带水果，有“果王”之称。

sentences.english: During the summer fruit season, you can hand-pick leeches off trees.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季水果成熟季节，您可以亲手摘荔枝。

sentences.english: It was the best time for litchi honey though.
In the early days of Tang Dynasty, litchi had won the title of delicacy.
sentences.chinese: 早在唐初，荔枝已属享有盛名之美味。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry/Chinese bayberry/Japanese bayberry/Myrica rubra/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
